ygData.subject: MM quest
ygData.msgSnippet: the book is part of the necro armor quests out of the temple of solusek ro. it has nothing to do with sk armor. the npc with the sk armor is the undead knight.
ygData.messageBody:
the book is part of the necro armor quests out of the temple of solusek ro.
it has nothing to do with sk armor.

the npc with the sk armor is the undead knight. it appears in the room
directly underneath the crypt. however, he is broken. he does not respond to
hails. not that it matters, since he will be killed as soon as he spawns,
simply because casters who are abusing a pathing bug upstairs come down to
that room to rest. and they may decide to off him for fun.

his spawn rate is greater than 2 hours. how long exactly? i have no f'in clue.

oh yes, the bayle list quest in fp is still broken. just wasted a quest item
it took me two days to get. is there some reason that verant sees fit to
give us quests and then insult us by having them not work?

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
